chapter_title.zh: 卷四十四 志第二十五 兵

summary_en: After pacifying Pingzhou, Zongwang halts the practice of organizing newly‑subdued Han and other groups into Meng’an/Mouke units, reverting them to regular civil administration.
excerpt_zh: 至天會二年，平州既平，宗望恐風俗揉雜，民情弗便，乃罷是制。諸部降人但置長吏，以下從漢官之號。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷四十四 志第二十五 兵
sources.note: Policy adjustment on organizing Han/Bohai under Meng’an/Mouke.

design_notes: Policy: Integrate Han Prefectures — reduces levy efficiency in mixed areas; improves order and tax compliance.

chapter_title.zh: 卷四十四 志第二十五 兵

summary_en: In the 1126 southern campaign, Jin mobilizes militia from eight routes (Yanshan, Yunzhong, Zhongjing, Shangjing, Dongjing, Liaodong, Pingzhou, Liaoxi, Changchun) and assigns them under ‘ten‑thousand household’ commands.
excerpt_zh: 四年，伐宋之役，調燕山、雲中、中京、上京、東京、遼東、平州、遼西、長春八路民兵，隸諸萬戶。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷四十四 志第二十五 兵
sources.note: Eight routes militia under wanhu/ten‑thousand households during 1126 campaign.

design_notes: Card: Mobilize Eight Routes — add Jin troops at northern entries; +unrest in origin routes; temporary logistics strain.

chapter_title.zh: 卷三百七十一

summary_en: Yuwen Xuzhong rallies over twenty thousand southeastern troops and deploys them along the Bian River approaches to Kaifeng for emergency defense as western forces open a corridor.
excerpt_zh: 虛中亦馳歸，收合散卒，得東南兵二萬餘人… 令統領於汴河上從門外駐兵。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷三百七十一
sources.note: Emergency muster and Bian River deployment.

design_notes: Event: Bian River Screen — while this is in effect, Kaifeng approach hexes impose +1 cost to besiegers; remove if corridor closed.

chapter_title.zh: 卷四十六（戶口）

primary.name_zh: 諸路州縣與猛安謀克部

summary_en: Registers distinguish levy‑bearing vs exempt households and special statuses (official/guard households, slave households), shaping who owes tax, labor, and transport service.
excerpt_zh: 其為戶有數等，有課役戶、不課役戶、本戶、雜戶、正戶、監戶、官戶、奴婢戶、二稅戶。…凡戶隸州縣者，與隸猛安謀克，其輸納高下又各不同。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷四十六 戶口
sources.note: Household categories and differing levy obligations.

design_notes: System: Levy Categories — when taxing a Jin county, adjust yield and corvée by category mix; slave/official households don’t contribute standard levy.

chapter_title.zh: 卷四十七 志第二十八: 食貨二 田制 租賦 牛頭稅
chapter_title.en: Vol. 47 Treatises XXVIII: Fiscal II — Field System, Rents, Ox-Head Tax

date.era: 天會年間至貞祐前（制度沿襲）

primary.name_zh: 河北東西路、山東東西路

summary_en: Meng'an–Mouke households receive and manage lands with reduced initial rents and mandatory planting; official lands and reclaimed tracts are allocated with staged tax starts, binding agrarian output to Jin’s military-administrative system.
excerpt_zh: 凡官地，猛安謀克及貧民請射者，寬鄉一丁百畝…請射荒地者，以最下第五等減半定租，八年始征之。作己業者以第七等減半為稅，七年始征之。（食貨二）

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷四十七 志第二十八: 食貨二 田制 租賦 牛頭稅
sources.chapter_title_en: Fiscal II — Field System, Rents, Ox-Head Tax
sources.note: Land grant and rent-reduction rules tied to Meng'an–Mouke households.

design_notes: Card: Meng'an–Mouke Agrarian Base — if controlling Hebei/Shandong routes, gain recurring grain (money/logistics); unlock mobilization bonuses.

chapter_title.zh: 卷四十四 志第二十五 兵

summary_en: Jin organizes military households and command under the Meng’an–Mouke structure, binding levy, settlement and frontier defense across the routes.
excerpt_zh: 以猛安、謀克統軍民之籍，世官相承，以備征戍。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷四十四 志第二十五 兵

design_notes: Card hook: Meng’an–Mouke System — if Shangjing is Jin‑controlled, recruit 1 :jin-horse: there; then take a Move action.

chapter_title.zh: 卷四十九 志第三十: 食貨四 鹽 酒 醋稅 茶 諸征商 金銀之稅
chapter_title.en: Vol. 49 Treatises XXX: Fiscal IV — Salt, Wine, Vinegar, Tea, Commerce and Metals

summary_en: Maintains the ox-head (ox-team) tax basis tied to plow-teams and household counts, structuring regular rent/tax yields across routes.
excerpt_zh: 金制，官地輸租，私田輸稅…夏稅畝取三合，秋稅畝取五升…計民田園…謂之物力錢。（並見食貨條）

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷四十七、四十九 食貨二、四
sources.note: Field tax baselines incl. ox-head tax, seasonal quotas.

design_notes: Card: Ox-Head Tax — steady revenue from plow-team households; bonus if harvest unaffected by disaster; interacts with relief policies.

chapter_title.zh: 卷五十五（百官：四方館）

summary_en: Central courier offices coordinate road relays and post horses for official dispatches and provisioning, enabling fast movement of orders and supplies.
excerpt_zh: 四方館…掌提控諸路驛舍驛馬並陳設器皿等事。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷五十五 百官
sources.note: Relay/post system responsibilities.

design_notes: Ongoing: Express Relays — during Strategic Move, ignore one Relay distance penalty on Jin orders or supply transfers.

chapter_title.zh: 卷五十六（百官：河渠監）
chapter_title.en: Vol. 56: Offices — River and Canal Directorate

summary_en: Dedicated river offices and巡河官 maintain levees, plant windbreaks, and supervise bridges and ferries, sustaining transport and flood defense across core reaches.
excerpt_zh: 監，掌川澤、津梁、舟楫、河渠之事… 都巡河官…掌巡視河道、修完堤堰、栽植榆柳。南京延津渡河橋官…譏察濟渡。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷五十六 百官
sources.note: River/bridge oversight,巡河官 duties, ferry supervision.

design_notes: Ongoing: River Works — controller of river nodes reduces Flood/Ferry penalties; +1 Logistics on adjacent over‑river moves this turn.

chapter_title.zh: 卷五十五（百官：倉場）

summary_en: Networked granaries and supervisors manage grain intake and fair outflow for army needs and relief, with named warehouses across the capital zone and routes.
excerpt_zh: 提舉倉場司…掌出納公平… 廣盈倉、永豐倉、常盈倉… 通濟倉與在京倉…

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷五十五 百官
sources.note: Granary offices and warehouse list for storage and disbursal.

design_notes: Ongoing: Route Granaries — once per year, convert 1 Grain token to +2 Logistics or +1 Coin in one Jin route; better during Famine to reduce losses.

chapter_title.zh: 卷四十九 志第三十: 食貨四 鹽 酒 醋稅 茶 諸征商 金銀之稅
chapter_title.en: Vol. 49 Treatises XXX: Fiscal IV — Salt, Wine, Vinegar, Tea, Commercial Taxes

date.era: 天會年間至紹興前（制度沿襲）

summary_en: Jin salt/tea and associated commercial levies (via salt commissions and state markets) provide route-level cashflow; key hubs at Shandong, Cangzhou, Baodi feed northern circuits.
excerpt_zh: 食貨四：鹽、酒、醋稅、茶、諸征商、金銀之稅。又置山東鹽使司…分管諸場發買收納恢辦之事。（志三十、百官三）

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷四十九 志第三十 食貨四
sources.note: Tax categories.

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷五十七 志第三十八 百官三
sources.note: Salt Commissions and staffing.

design_notes: Card: Jin Salt Network — control northern salt hubs to gain recurring revenue; extra payout if connected to 榷場 corridors.

chapter_title.zh: 卷五十 志第三十一: 食貨五 榷場 和糴 常平倉 水田 區田 入粟鬻度牒
chapter_title.en: Vol. 50 Treatises XXXI: Fiscal V — State Markets, Grain Purchases, Ever-Normal Granaries

summary_en: State markets (榷場) and Ever‑Normal granary policies (和糴/糶) provide price stabilization and fiscal intake; route transport offices implement purchases and releases as needed.
excerpt_zh: 食貨五：榷場、和糴、常平倉…豐年增價以糴，儉歲減價以出，以平粟價。（食貨五）

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷五十 志第三十一 食貨五
sources.chapter_title_en: Fiscal V — State Markets and Granaries
sources.note: Grain purchase and release policy; state markets.

design_notes: Card: Jin Ever‑Normal — if controlling route seats with 常平倉, gain income and reduce famine penalties; optional play to stabilize prices.

chapter_title.zh: 卷四十六（戶口）

summary_en: Implements tri‑annual household registers with five‑house Bao/neighbor groupings; appoints ward and village heads (fangzheng/lizheng) and constable strongmen for levy, muster, and policing.
excerpt_zh: 凡戶口計帳，三年一籍… 令民以五家為保… 郭下置坊正，村社…為鄉置里正… 置壯丁，以佐主首巡警盜賊。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷四十六 戶口
sources.note: Tri‑annual registers; Bao/neighbor organization; local heads and patrols.

design_notes: Ongoing State: Household Registers — controller may draw 1 Levy per turn from registered counties; improved order checks in registered locales.

chapter_title.zh: 卷四十六（戶口）

summary_en: Property‑based ‘wùlì’ assessments complement land and household registers to apportion tax and labor; figures adjust with sales and operations and are revisited to keep levies even.
excerpt_zh: 租稅之外…征錢曰物力… 有司始以三年一籍，後變為通檢，又為推排… 隨業輸納… 貧者自貧，富者自富。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷四十六 戶口
sources.note: Narrative on ‘wùlì’ (property) assessment, census cycles, and rebalancing.

design_notes: Policy: Assess Wùlì — on enactment, rebalance 1 Jin county: +1 Coin this turn, then −1 Public Order if overused.

chapter_title.zh: 卷二十九 本紀第二十九 天祚皇帝三

primary.name_zh: 燕京—涿易檀順景薊諸州
primary.name_pinyin: Yanjing—Zhuo, Yi, Tan, Shun, Jing, Ji prefectures

summary_en: Jin drives out major Yanjing households east and hands over empty corridor cities (Zhuo, Yi, Tan, Shun, Jing, Ji) to Song as part of a settlement, dislocating populations along the frontier.
excerpt_zh: 金人既克燕，驅燕之大家東徙，以燕空城及涿、易、檀、順、景、薊州與宋以塞盟。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷二十九 本紀第二十九 天祚皇帝三

design_notes: Frontier Shift — Song gains nominal control markers on specified corridor cities; initial population unrest; Jin logistics lane adjusts; refugee markers move east.

chapter_title.zh: 卷二十九 本紀第二十九 天祚皇帝三

summary_en: Pingzhou declares for Song as the Taining Army under Zhang Cang; brief recognition and rewards are followed by a rapid Jin strike and beheading, ending the experiment.
excerpt_zh: 宋建平州為泰寧軍，以倉為節度使… 金人舉兵來襲… 安中不得已，殺倉，函其首送金。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷二十九 本紀第二十九 天祚皇帝三

design_notes: Northern Faction Flip — Song may place a temporary control/ally marker at Pingzhou; immediately spawn a Jin raid; if Song cannot protect it within 1–2 turns, remove and apply Morale −1 (Song).

chapter_title.zh: 食貨上四（屯田常平義倉）
chapter_title.en: Treatises: Fiscal IV — Tuntian, Ever‑Normal & Charity Granaries

summary_en: Throughout the war and settlement years, Ever‑Normal and Charity granaries in the southeast purchase at low prices in bumper years and lend or sell at reduced prices in bad years to stabilize markets and feed the poor.
excerpt_zh: 常平、義倉…遇貴量減市價糶，遇賤量增市價糴… 貸以種食，直以振給。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 食貨上四（屯田常平義倉）
sources.chapter_title_en: Fiscal IV — Tuntian, Ever‑Normal & Charity Granaries
sources.note: Granary purchase and relief mechanism described across the period.

design_notes: Ongoing State: Ever‑Normal Relief — while controller holds two listed circuits, may flip one Famine marker to Normal per year; +1 Coin swing on price events.

chapter_title.zh: 食貨上五（役法—免役與募役）
chapter_title.en: Treatises: Fiscal V — Service Law (Commutation and Hiring)

summary_en: Corvée obligations across key southern circuits are increasingly commuted into money and met by hired service (muyan/zhuyiqian), regularizing staffing of warehouses, transport, and yamen while shifting burdens into cash.
excerpt_zh: 役錢…凡州縣之役，無不可募人之理… 鄉差人戶悉用投名人代之。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 食貨上五（役法）
sources.note: 免役、募役、助役錢等制度敘述。

design_notes: Ongoing State: Commuted Service — treat one Corvée requirement as paid Coin in listed circuits; +Logistics when hiring, −Public Order on bad harvest years.

chapter_title.zh: 食貨下五 鹽下 茶上
chapter_title.en: Treatises: Fiscal Affairs V — Salt (Lower) / Tea (Upper)

date.era: 建炎至紹興間（制度沿襲）

summary_en: Fujian operates multiple sea-salt markets (Fuzhou/Quanzhou/Xinghua), with annual sales rising since Tianxing; steady revenue to coastal prefectures.
excerpt_zh: 其在福建曰福州長清場，歲鬻十萬三百石…天聖以來，福漳泉州、興化軍皆鬻鹽，歲視舊額增…（食貨下五·鹽下）

sources.chapter_title_zh: 食貨下五 鹽下 茶上
sources.chapter_title_en: Treatises: Fiscal Affairs V — Salt (Lower) / Tea (Upper)
sources.note: Fujian sea-salt sale volumes and markets.

design_notes: Card: Fujian Sea Salt — if controlling Fuzhou/Quanzhou/Xinghua, gain recurring revenue; extra if maritime trade route is open.

chapter_title.zh: 食貨下四 鹽中

date.era: 建炎至紹興間（制度沿襲）

summary_en: The Huai–Sea salt system supplies Jiangnan, Liangzhe, Jinghu and others via Chu/Tong/Tai/Haizhou and Lianshui, forming a core revenue source under state monopoly.
excerpt_zh: 其在淮南曰楚州鹽城監…通州豐利監…泰州海陵監…海州板浦…漣水軍…歲煮…各給本州及…江南…兩浙…荊湖…（食貨下四·鹽中）

sources.chapter_title_zh: 食貨下四 鹽中
sources.note: Enumerates Huai/Sea salt production sites and distribution circuits.

design_notes: Card: Huai–Sea Salt Network — if controlling Huai salt loci (楚/通/泰/海/漣水), gain recurring revenue; ports further south get bonus if connected.

chapter_title.zh: 食貨下八 商稅 市易 均輸 互市舶法
chapter_title.en: Treatises: Fiscal Affairs VIII — Commercial Tax, Market Equalization, State Trade, Maritime Trade

date.era: 建炎至紹興間（制度沿襲）

summary_en: Baseline commercial taxation regime (transit and market taxes) standardizes rates and exemptions across prefectures; supports steady city revenue.
excerpt_zh: 商稅凡州縣皆置務…行者齎貨，謂之過稅…居者市鬻，謂之住稅…名物各隨地宜而不一焉。（食貨下八·商稅…互市舶法）

sources.chapter_title_zh: 食貨下八 商稅 市易 均輸 互市舶法
sources.chapter_title_en: Treatises: Fiscal Affairs VIII — Commercial Tax, Market Equalization, State Trade, Maritime Trade
sources.note: Defines commercial tax structures and exemptions; includes maritime trade law heading.

design_notes: Card: Market Taxation — each controlled prefectural city with an active market yields tax; bonuses if on trade corridor/coastal hub.

chapter_title.zh: 卷二十四 本紀第二十四 高宗一

date.era: 建炎元年冬十月丁巳朔後

summary_en: The court shifts to the Huai-Yang region by water; the Empress Dowager arrives in Yangzhou, establishing a new seat.
excerpt_zh: 冬十月丁巳朔，帝登舟幸淮甸。… 太后至揚州。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷二十四 本紀第二十四 高宗一

design_notes: Card hook: Flight to the Huai — move capital marker; adjust supply network southward.

chapter_title.zh: 卷一百八十四 食貨下五九（鹽法）

summary_en: Allows those providing grain for the front to redeem salt directly at the pools, reducing transaction layers and accelerating supply to authorized markets.
excerpt_zh: …入納糧草者，許直赴池請鹽，省復入京批鈔之擾。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷一百八十四 食貨下五九 鹽法
sources.note: Direct redemption at the pool for contributors of grain/forage.

design_notes: Logistics Shortcut — ignore one Market step for Salt shipments this turn; then add +1 Exhaustion to that pool.

chapter_title.zh: 卷二十四 本紀第二十四 高宗一

summary_en: Following court struggle, Li Gang is removed from office; Huang Qianshan rises as chief minister.
excerpt_zh: 乙亥，用張浚言，罷李綱左僕射。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷二十四 本紀第二十四 高宗一

design_notes: Card hook: Purge the Hawk — remove a hardliner; shift policy toward negotiation.

chapter_title.zh: 卷二十四 本紀第二十四 高宗一

summary_en: An imperial envoy orders Zhang Bangchang to commit suicide in Tanzhou, closing the Great Chu episode.
excerpt_zh: 壬子，命湖南撫諭官馬伸持詔賜張邦昌死於潭州。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷二十四 本紀第二十四 高宗一

design_notes: Card hook: Settle Scores — purge collaborators; remove unrest in central circuits.

chapter_title.zh: 卷二十四 本紀第二十四 高宗一

summary_en: Sets up nineteen river/huai/yang defense commands and seventy-seven naval commands; begins large-scale shipbuilding on Jiang and Huai.
excerpt_zh: 置沿河、沿淮、沿江帥府十有九… 別置水軍七十七將，造舟江、淮諸路。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷二十四 本紀第二十四 高宗一

design_notes: Card hook: Riverine Defense Network — improve crossing interdiction, enable naval moves.

chapter_title.zh: 卷二十四 本紀第二十四 高宗一

summary_en: On Huang Qianshan's recommendation, the outspoken student Chen Dong is executed, chilling dissent.
excerpt_zh: 壬午，用黃潛善議，殺上書太學生陳東。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷二十四 本紀第二十四 高宗一

design_notes: Card hook: Silence the Students — reduce unrest; increase legitimacy cost.

chapter_title.zh: 卷一百八十四 食貨下五九（鹽法）

summary_en: Revises Jiechi salt scrip rules at the Jingkang transition, fixing per-ticket values and rebalancing redemption to stabilize salt flows and pricing.
excerpt_zh: 靖康元年… 解鹽鈔… 每席鈔為八貫者，盡收入鈔麵；其入納糧草者，許直赴池請鹽。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷一百八十四 食貨下五九 鹽法
sources.note: Salt scrip valuation and direct-pool redemption.

design_notes: Card: Salt Scrip Revaluation — stabilize frontier supply; controller gains +1 Revenue if operating a Salt Pool node.

chapter_title.zh: 卷二十四 本紀第二十四 高宗一

summary_en: Creates six river patrol-inspection offices to supervise border security and transport.
excerpt_zh: 置沿河巡察六使。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷二十四 本紀第二十四 高宗一

design_notes: Card hook: Patrol Inspectors — improve supply lines; reveal adjacent enemy stacks.

chapter_title.zh: 卷一百八十五 食貨下六○ 茶下

summary_en: Issues orders to curb Sichuan tea intruding into designated market areas, differentiating penalties by degree and protecting assigned sales zones.
excerpt_zh: 靖康元年，詔川茶侵客茶地者，以多寡差定其罪。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷一百八十五 食貨下六○ 茶下
sources.note: Boundary enforcement on Sichuan tea.

design_notes: Border Markets: Owner of Shaanxi/Sichuan may tax tea caravans; crossing into rival market without permit triggers penalties.

chapter_title.zh: 卷三百七十一

summary_en: As Jin withdrew under negotiation, Wang Churen urges ambush at Jun and Hua to strike the enemy mid‑crossing and stockpiles grain and arms for a 10,000‑strong relief force.
excerpt_zh: 處仁儲糧列備，合銳兵萬人… 奏宜伏兵浚、滑，擊其半濟，必可成功。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷三百七十一
sources.note: Proposal to ambush at Jun/Hua with logistics preparations.

design_notes: Plan: Strike at the Crossing — if Jin stack attempts River Crossing in Henan this turn, Song may play to inflict auto‑losses and gain +1 Morale.

chapter_title.zh: 卷三百六十九 列傳第一百二十八

summary_en: Wang Yuan suppresses Wu Zhan's revolt at Zhaozhou during the crisis around the Jingkang disaster.
excerpt_zh: 吳湛據趙州叛，淵討平之。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷三百六十九

design_notes: Card hook: Stamp Out Revolt — remove a rebel marker in North China.

chapter_title.zh: 卷一百八十一 食貨下三○ 會子鹽上
chapter_title.en: Volume 181 Treatises: Paper Money and Salt (Upper)

summary_en: To ease transport of cash during early relocation, the court issues Guanzi treasury certificates at Wuzhou; merchants redeem at monopoly offices for cash or goods, drawing complaints over slow redemption.
excerpt_zh: 紹興元年，有司因婺州屯兵，請樁辦合用錢，而路不通舟，錢重難致。乃造關子付婺州，召商人入中，執關於榷貨務請錢…人皆嗟怨。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷一百八十一 食貨下三○ 會子鹽上
sources.chapter_title_en: Vol. 181 Treatises: Paper Money and Salt (Upper)
sources.note: Early Shaoxing Guanzi issuance for garrison finance.

design_notes: Card: Guanzi Certificates — convert 2 Money into temporary liquidity (usable only in adjacent regions); slight inefficiency on redemption.

chapter_title.zh: 卷二十四 本紀第二十四 高宗一

summary_en: Gaozong accepts the Mandate at Yingtian, proclaims the Jianyan era, and issues broad amnesties and administrative resets.
excerpt_zh: 五月庚寅朔，帝登壇受命，… 改元建炎。大赦…

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷二十四 本紀第二十四 高宗一
sources.note: Enthronement and Jianyan proclamation.

design_notes: Card hook: Jianyan Restoration — stabilize court; unlock southern recruitment/administration bonuses.

chapter_title.zh: 卷二十四 本紀第二十四 高宗一

summary_en: After Wang Yan's defeat near the Taihang, Yue Fei forms his own unit, marking his rise as a field commander.
excerpt_zh: 王彥及金人戰，敗績… 其裨將岳飛引其部曲自為一軍。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷二十四 本紀第二十四 高宗一

design_notes: Card hook: Yue Fei's Banner — spawn elite infantry; boosts morale in nearby nodes.

chapter_title.zh: 卷一百八十五 食貨下六○ 茶下

summary_en: At Zhenzhou, the court prints notes to facilitate sales of southeastern tea and salt amid liquidity and transport constraints in the first Jianyan year.
excerpt_zh: 高宗建炎初，於真州印鈔，給賣東南茶鹽。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷一百八十五 食貨下六○ 茶下
sources.note: Printed notes for tea/salt sales at Zhenzhou at the start of Jianyan.

design_notes: Card: Monetize Tea & Salt — convert 2 Money in Lower Yangzi into 1 immediate Revenue token at a coastal market.

chapter_title.zh: 卷三百六十 列傳第一百十九 宗澤 趙鼎
chapter_title.en: Volume 360 Biographies 119: Zong Ze, Zhao Ding

summary_en: Zong Ze proposes organizing five Hebei prefectures with standing militias to mutually reinforce under a unified plan, anchoring northern defense.
excerpt_zh: 上言：『邢、洺、磁、趙、相五州各蓄精兵二萬人，敵攻一郡則四郡皆應，是一郡之兵常有十萬人。』

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷三百六十 列傳第一百十九 宗澤 趙鼎
sources.chapter_title_en: Volume 360 Biographies 119: Zong Ze, Zhao Ding
sources.note: Hebei mutual-aid militia proposal at Cizhou.

design_notes: Card hook: Northern Muster — place Hebei Militia markers; +Reaction in adjacent prefectures.

chapter_title.zh: 卷三 本紀第三: 太宗

date.era: 天會四年春正月至閏月

summary_en: Jin armies converge and storm Bianjing; the capital falls during the Jingkang catastrophe.
excerpt_zh: 閏月… 丙辰，克汴城。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷三 本紀第三: 太宗

design_notes: Card hook: Jingkang — immediate political shock to Song; Jin plunder; map control shifts in Henan.

chapter_title.zh: 卷七十四 列傳第十二 宗翰、宗望

summary_en: Zonghan storms Taiyuan, capturing the Hedong bastion as part of the 1127 Jin offensive.
excerpt_zh: 九月丙寅，宗翰克太原。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷七十四 列傳第十二

design_notes: Card hook: Fall of Taiyuan — unlock Hedong corridors; Song loses a key fortress.

chapter_title.zh: 卷三 本紀第三: 太宗

summary_en: Taizong issues orders for a major campaign against Song: Zonghan marches from the west; Zongwang advances from the north toward Yanshan.
excerpt_zh: 十月甲辰，詔諸將伐宋。… 移賚勃極烈宗翰兼左副元帥先鋒，自西京入太原；宗望…自南京入燕山。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷三 本紀第三: 太宗

design_notes: Card hook: Raise the Banners — Jin gains initiative markers; Song must ready defenses.

chapter_title.zh: 卷七十七 列傳第十五 昌(撻懶)

summary_en: Talan smashes 20,000 Song at Qi, overruns Gongzhou, Ningling, and Shuyang, capturing senior commanders and opening the Henan corridor.
excerpt_zh: 撻懶、阿里刮破宋兵二萬於杞… 遂克拱州，降寧陵，破睢陽，下亳州。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷七十七 列傳第十五

design_notes: Card hook: Open Henan Corridor — enable rapid southward marches; fatigue penalty.

chapter_title.zh: 卷七十四 列傳第十二 宗翰、宗望

summary_en: Zonghan arrives at Bian; with Zongwang they take the city and accept Qinzong's surrender.
excerpt_zh: 閏月… 宗翰至汴… 丙辰，克汴州。… 十二月癸亥，少帝奏表降。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷七十四 列傳第十二

design_notes: Card hook: Seal the Capital — immediate legitimacy shock on Song; loot and captives.

chapter_title.zh: 卷七十八 列傳第十六 劉彥宗等
chapter_title.en: Volume 78 Biographies 16: Liu Yanzong et al.

summary_en: Issues amnesty and instructions to pacify the Central Capital routes and urge a return to farming after initial conquests, delegating selection of officials to accompany proclamations.
excerpt_zh: 天會二年，詔彥宗曰：『中京等兩路先多拒命…貰其官民之罪…卿等選官與使者往諭之，使勤於稼穡。』

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷七十八 列傳第十六
sources.note: Amnesty and farming order for Central Capital routes.

design_notes: Card: Pacify & Plant — controller of 中京/燕京 routes reduces unrest and gains modest revenue growth over time.

chapter_title.zh: 卷七十八 列傳第十六 劉彥宗等
chapter_title.en: Volume 78 Biographies 16: Liu Yanzong et al.

summary_en: Prohibits plunder of surrendering populations; orders all commanders to restrain troops with severe penalties (‘autumn‑hair offenses punished without pardon’).
excerpt_zh: …或有將卒貪悍，冒犯紀律，輒掠降人者。已諭諸部及軍帥，約束兵士，秋毫有犯，必刑無赦。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷七十八 列傳第十六
sources.note: Order restraining troops to stabilize newly‑subdued areas.

design_notes: Card: Prohibit Plunder — lower unrest and increase future tax yield in newly pacified prefectures; minor short‑term army morale cost.

chapter_title.zh: 卷七十八 列傳第十六 劉彥宗

primary.name_zh: 安肅 雄州 霸州 廣信

summary_en: Distributes Jin garrisons across Ansu, Xiong, Ba, and Guangxin and leaves command coordination at Yanjing to stabilize Hebei corridors and supply lines.
excerpt_zh: 宗望分將士屯安肅、雄、霸、廣信之境，留…彥宗于燕京節制諸軍。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷七十八 列傳第十六
sources.note: Post‑campaign garrison distribution and command.

design_notes: Card: Hebei Garrison Grid — lowers unrest and boosts requisition capacity along the Hebei corridor for controller.

chapter_title.zh: 卷七十七 列傳第十五 劉豫

summary_en: Assigned in Zhexi, Liu Yu resides at Yizhen; after his wife dies and he enters mourning for his father, he seeks a Jiangnan command but is refused, and leaves office disgruntled.
excerpt_zh: 徙浙西。抵儀真，喪妻翟氏，繼值父憂。… 豫欲得江南一郡，宰相不與，忿忿而去。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷七十七 列傳第十五 劉豫

design_notes: Foreshadowing: a sidelined Liu Yu becomes receptive to Jin overtures.

chapter_title.zh: 卷七十八 列傳第十六 韓企先

summary_en: Moves central organs (Chancellery and Military Secretariat) to Yanjing; authorizes them to oversee selection, levies, and tax collection across Chinese territories under Jin rule.
excerpt_zh: …移置中書、樞密于燕京，凡漢地選授調發租稅皆承制行之。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷七十八 列傳第十六
sources.note: Central offices relocated and empowered in Yanjing.

design_notes: Card: Yanjing Central Organs — increases governance reach and boosts route‑level income for controller of Yanjing.

chapter_title.zh: 卷七十八 列傳第十六 劉彥宗

summary_en: Grants Liu Yanzong authority to appoint all sub–first‑rank officials in Yanjing, consolidating civil administration and enabling tax and levy coordination.
excerpt_zh: 詔彥宗凡燕京一品以下官皆承制注授。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷七十八 列傳第十六
sources.note: Yanjing appointment authority after initial conquests.

design_notes: Card: Yanjing Civil Appointments — improve governance and steady revenue in Yanjing and adjacent counties for controller.

chapter_title.zh: 卷七十八 列傳第十六 劉彥宗 時立愛
chapter_title.en: Volume 78 Biographies 16: Liu Yanzong, Shi Li'ai

summary_en: Organizes civil administration to restore farming and stockpiling around Yanjing, provisioning the capital and forwarding grain to armies on campaign.
excerpt_zh: 軍旅之暇，治官政，庀民事，務農積穀，內供京師，外給轉餉。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷七十八 列傳第十六
sources.note: Yanjing provisioning and transfer grain logistics.

design_notes: Card: Yanjing Supply Corridor — controller gains steady grain/money from the route; improves army supply rolls in adjacent fronts.

chapter_title.zh: 卷七十二 列傳第十 銀朮可

summary_en: Yin Shuge maintains the siege of Taiyuan, defeating multiple Song relief forces at Wenshui, Yuci, Taigu, and routes around.
excerpt_zh: 銀朮可留兵圍之… 破宋兵於文水、榆次、太谷…

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷七十二 列傳第十

design_notes: Card hook: Tighten the Noose — attrit enemy relief; siege progress +1.

chapter_title.zh: 卷七十七 列傳第十五 宗弼本名兀朮…
chapter_title.en: Volume 77 Biographies 15: Zongbi (Wuzhu), Zhang Bangchang, Liu Yu, Talan

summary_en: Zongbi defeats large Song forces on the Hebei front, taking Kaide, Puzhou, and Daming; the Hebei plain is subdued.
excerpt_zh: 攻開德府… 先登破之。攻大名府，宗弼軍復先登，破其城。河北平。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷七十七 列傳第十五

design_notes: Card hook: Hebei Subdued — Jin gains control markers in North China; Song recruitment there reduced.

chapter_title.zh: 卷七十四 列傳第十二 宗翰

summary_en: After suppressing Zheng, Zonghan resettles large populations from Luoyang/Xiangyang/Yingchang–Zheng–Jing–Fang–Tang–Deng–Chen–Cai to Hebei to consolidate control.
excerpt_zh: 遂遷洛陽、襄陽、潁昌、汝、鄭、均、房、唐、鄧、陳、蔡之民于河北。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷七十四 列傳第十二

design_notes: Card hook: Move the People — Jin increases secure tax base; local unrest spike in evacuated areas.

chapter_title.zh: 卷二十五 本紀第二十五 高宗二

summary_en: Orders the mustering of 80,000 'Zhenhua Army' across core northern and Huai regions.
excerpt_zh: 壬午，詔京畿、京東西、河北、淮南路置振華軍八萬人。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷二十五 本紀第二十五 高宗二

design_notes: Card hook: Raise Zhenhua — add militia with low cohesion; improves garrisons.

chapter_title.zh: 卷二十五 本紀第二十五 高宗二

summary_en: Orders Jiang-Zhe circuits to train water forces and build warships for river defense.
excerpt_zh: 丁丑，詔江、浙沿流州軍練水軍，造戰艦。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷二十五 本紀第二十五 高宗二

design_notes: Card hook: River Fleet — unlock naval moves; interdict crossings.

chapter_title.zh: 卷二十五 本紀第二十五 高宗二

summary_en: Establishes the temporary-court monopoly office at Yangzhou to control critical revenues.
excerpt_zh: 辛卯，置行在榷貨務。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷二十五 本紀第二十五 高宗二

design_notes: Card hook: Wartime Monopoly — gain coin; increase unrest in trade hubs.

chapter_title.zh: 卷三百六十四 列傳第一百二十三 韓世忠

summary_en: Zhang Yu comes from Jinshan to the walls of Yangzhou; Han Shizhong personally enters the camp to persuade surrender, easing panic and restoring order.
excerpt_zh: 時張遇自金山來降，抵城下，不解甲，人心危懼，世忠獨入其壘，曉以逆順，眾悉聽命。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷三百六十四 列傳第一百二十三 韓世忠

design_notes: Event: Enter the Camp — on success, pacify a prefecture and gain temporary militia.

chapter_title.zh: 卷三百六十 列傳第一百十九 宗澤 趙鼎
chapter_title.en: Volume 360 Biographies 119: Zong Ze, Zhao Ding

actors.name_en_or_pinyin: Wang Zaixing, Li Gui, Wang Dalang

summary_en: Across the central-north, Zong Ze issues pardons and persuasion to major bands (Yang Jin ‘Ox Without Horns’, Wang Zaixing, Li Gui, Wang Dalang), bringing them over as loyalist ‘righteous armies’.
excerpt_zh: 時楊進號沒角牛，兵三十萬，王再興、李貴、王大郎等各擁眾數萬… 澤遣人諭以禍福，悉招降之。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷三百六十 列傳第一百十九 宗澤 趙鼎
sources.chapter_title_en: Volume 360 Biographies 119: Zong Ze, Zhao Ding
sources.note: Zong Ze recruits regional bands into loyalist forces.

design_notes: Card hook: Rally the Righteous — place Loyalist Insurgents behind Jin lines; enable Raids and Intel in Hebei/Shandong.

chapter_title.zh: 卷三百六十 列傳第一百十九 宗澤 趙鼎
chapter_title.en: Volume 360 Biographies 119: Zong Ze, Zhao Ding

summary_en: As Kaifeng governor, Zong Ze clamps down on banditry and re-establishes order in the capital amid war dislocation.
excerpt_zh: 既至，首捕誅舍賊者數人。下令曰：『為盜者，贓無輕重，並從軍法。』由是盜賊屏息，民賴以安。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷三百六十 列傳第一百十九 宗澤 趙鼎
sources.chapter_title_en: Volume 360 Biographies 119: Zong Ze, Zhao Ding
sources.note: Zong Ze restores order in Kaifeng.

design_notes: Card hook: Martial Order — place Security; reduce Unrest in capital this turn.

chapter_title.zh: 卷三百六十 列傳第一百十九 宗澤 趙鼎
chapter_title.en: Volume 360 Biographies 119: Zong Ze, Zhao Ding

summary_en: Zong Ze rides to the camp of Wang Shan, a major insurgent chief, persuading him to lay down arms and serve; his band is absorbed into loyalist operations against Jin.
excerpt_zh: 王善者，河東巨寇也… 澤單騎馳至善營… 謂之曰：『今日乃汝立功之秋，不可失也。』善感泣曰：『敢不效力。』遂解甲降。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷三百六十 列傳第一百十九 宗澤 趙鼎
sources.chapter_title_en: Volume 360 Biographies 119: Zong Ze, Zhao Ding
sources.note: Wang Shan submits to Zong Ze at Kaifeng.

design_notes: Card hook: Turn the Band — convert an Insurgent stack to Song; +Local Support in central plain.

chapter_title.zh: 卷三 本紀第三: 太宗

summary_en: Jin formally demotes the two captured Song emperors to commoners following the fall of Bianjing.
excerpt_zh: 二月丙寅，詔降宋二帝為庶人。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷三 本紀第三: 太宗

design_notes: Card hook: Demote the Captives — increase Jin leverage in talks; Song legitimacy penalty.

chapter_title.zh: 卷二十五 本紀第二十五 高宗二

summary_en: Temporarily suppresses the maritime trade supervisorates in Liangzhe and Fujian to cut administrative load amid flight south.
excerpt_zh: 六月…省兩浙、福建提舉市舶司。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷二十五 本紀第二十五 高宗二
sources.note: Suppresses coastal 市舶 offices.

design_notes: Decision: Cut Port Offices — -admin upkeep, -customs income; reduces coastal unrest from levies.

chapter_title.zh: 卷七十七 列傳第十五 劉豫

summary_en: Jin elevates Liu Yu as Pacification Commissioner for Jingdong East/West and Huainan, and governor of Dongping with overall command of multiple routes, consolidating his regime base.
excerpt_zh: 遂為京東東、西、淮南安撫使，知東平府兼諸路馬步軍都總管，節制河外諸軍。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷七十七 列傳第十五 劉豫

design_notes: Administration: Place control markers in Huainan and Qing–Qi; improve recruitment in occupied North China for one turn.

chapter_title.zh: 卷四十六（戶口）

summary_en: After wartime disruptions, the court allows parents and spouses to redeem free persons who were seized and driven as labor, restoring their status.
excerpt_zh: 七年，詔兵興以來，良人被略為驅者，聽其父母妻子贖之。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷四十六 戶口
sources.note: Tianhui 7 decree permitting redemption of driven freemen.

design_notes: Relief: Redeem the Driven — remove 1 Unrest in a selected county and convert 1 Forced Labor marker to Neutral Pop.

chapter_title.zh: 卷七十四 完顏宗望傳

summary_en: Orders forbid looting, adjust taxes to harvest conditions, and allow stipend-drawing soldiers willing to demobilize to return to farming.
excerpt_zh: 若諸軍敢利於俘掠…當底於罰…聞此歲不登…度其糧數賦之。射糧軍願為民者，使復田里。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷七十四

design_notes: Stabilization event — lowers revolt risk and shifts some manpower back to economy for Jin.

chapter_title.zh: 卷七十四 完顏宗翰傳等

primary.name_zh: 南京路（燕京）及河北諸鎮

summary_en: In newly annexed areas, Jin selects capable local officials, issues amnesties, lightens levies, and encourages agriculture to pacify the populace.
excerpt_zh: 赦南京官民…別敕有司輕徭賦、勸稼穡…疆場之事，一決於宗望。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷七十四

design_notes: Jin pacification policy — reduces unrest; boosts revenue uptime in occupied prefectures.

chapter_title.zh: 卷七十七 列傳第十五 宗弼本名兀朮…

summary_en: At the Yangzi crossing, Zongbi uses fire‑arrows to ignite Han Shizhong's rigging, breaking the blockade and destroying much of the Song fleet.
excerpt_zh: 以火箭射世忠舟上五糸兩… 皆自焚，煙焰滿江… 舟軍殲焉。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷七十七 列傳第十五

design_notes: Card hook: Burn the Rigging — cancel enemy naval intercept; enable Jin crossing.

chapter_title.zh: 卷七十八 列傳第十六 劉彥宗

summary_en: Advocates collecting maps and registers rather than plunder during the second siege of Bianjing; commanders adopt the policy, strengthening post‑conquest administration.
excerpt_zh: 彥宗謂宗翰、宗望曰：『蕭何入關，秋毫無犯，惟收圖籍。遼太宗入汴，載路車、法服、石經以歸，皆令則也。』二帥嘉納之。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷七十八 列傳第十六
sources.note: Administrative focus on registers and archives.

design_notes: Card: Seize the Registers — controller gains admin capacity and intelligence bonus in newly occupied prefectures.

chapter_title.zh: 卷七十七 列傳第十五 劉豫

summary_en: Under Jin pressure at Jinan, Liu Yu kills the stalwart defender Guan Sheng and surrenders the city to Jin, publicly breaking with the Southern Song.
excerpt_zh: 撻懶攻濟南，有關勝者，濟南驍將也，屢出城拒戰，豫遂殺關勝出降。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷七十七 列傳第十五 劉豫

design_notes: Trigger: Convert control in the Qing–Qi area; enable later 'Install Da Qi' chain.

chapter_title.zh: 卷七十二 列傳第十 婁室

summary_en: Lou Shi drives the western campaign: takes Tong–Hua, Jingzhao, Fengxiang, Yan'an, and a chain of forts, installing Jin administration.
excerpt_zh: 下同、華二州，克京兆府… 遂克鳳翔… 進克延安府… 置官府輯安之。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷七十二 列傳第十

design_notes: Card hook: Secure the West — Jin gains recruitment in Shaanxi; pressure on Sichuan corridor.

chapter_title.zh: 卷七十四 完顏宗翰傳等

summary_en: After taking key prefectures, Jin relocates populations from Luoyang, Xiangyang, Yingchang, etc., to Hebei and stations forces along the rivers to secure the rear.
excerpt_zh: 遂遷洛陽、襄陽、潁昌、汝、鄭、均、房、唐、鄧、陳、蔡之民于河北…分留將士，夾河屯守。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷七十四

design_notes: Jin card: Resettlement — shift population/economy north; improves control/logistics in Hebei.

chapter_title.zh: 卷七十四 列傳第十二 宗望

summary_en: After successive victories, Yanshan falls; massive stocks of horses, armor, and weapons are captured and the prefectures pacified.
excerpt_zh: 遂取燕山府，馬萬匹、甲胄五萬、兵七萬，州縣悉平。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷七十四 列傳第十二

design_notes: Card hook: Arm the Hosts — Jin gains supply surge; enable further pushes south.

chapter_title.zh: 卷七十四 列傳第十二 宗望

summary_en: Zongwang defeats Guo Yaoshi's 45,000 at the Bai River, opening the Yanshan line for Jin control.
excerpt_zh: 破郭藥師兵四萬五千於白河。

sources.chapter_title_zh: 卷七十四 列傳第十二

design_notes: Card hook: Break the White River Line — speed Jin advance in Hebei/Yan.

chapter_title.zh: 食貨下八 商稅 市易 均輸 互市舶法
chapter_title.en: Treatises: Fiscal VIII — Commercial Tax and State Trade

date.era: 建炎三年至紹興十二年

summary_en: Standardizes transit and market taxes with small‑value exemptions and temporary remissions in disaster years, stabilizing urban commerce in Lin’an and the Lower Yangzi.
excerpt_zh: 商稅凡州縣皆置務…行者齎貨為過稅，居者市鬻為住稅…非常之患則蠲免有差。（食貨下八）

sources.chapter_title_zh: 食貨下八 商稅 市易 均輸 互市舶法
sources.note: Tax structure and exemptions; urban stabilization.

design_notes: Card: Commercial Tax Tuning — controller of prefectural cities gains resilient tax even during shocks; extra effect if disaster flag set.

chapter_title.zh: 食貨下八 商稅 市易 均輸 互市舶法
chapter_title.en: Treatises: Fiscal VIII — Commercial Tax, State Trade, Equalization, Maritime Trade

date.era: 建炎三年至紹興十二年（沿革）

summary_en: Guangzhou’s maritime office levies customs on South Seas trade under standard law, producing high cash yields to whoever holds the port.
excerpt_zh: 互市舶法：…互市之制有常，稅入隨路而集。（食貨下八）

sources.chapter_title_zh: 食貨下八 商稅 市易 均輸 互市舶法

sources.chapter_title_zh: 食貨下八 商稅 市易 均輸 互市舶法

chapter_title.en: Treatises: Fiscal VIII — Commercial Tax, State Trade, Equalization, Maritime Trade
